text: Pen abe, tap tep God chɨnop ñak ak olap ke yek, bɨ nokom tap si tap tɨmel gek chɨnop gak ak olap ke yek. Bɨ anɨb ak tap si tap tɨmel nokom olap gek, God binɨb okok kɨlop tɨg asɨk bɨlokek takaw awl ak owak. God pen kɨlop tap tep ñak ak anɨgɨl yek. Binɨb kɨli tap si tap tɨmel kuŋay gɨlak won ak, kɨlop monmon dɨtep gek takaw ma yek.
